commands.name: enconvo_cloud_plan
commands.title: Enconvo Cloud Plan
commands.description: Speech-to-Text Provider that allows you to use [Groq](https://console.groq.com/docs/speech-text)'s online Speech-to-Text service

preferences.name: prompt
preferences.title: Prompt
preferences.description: Provide context or specify how to spell unfamiliar words (limited to 224 tokens).

preferences.name: speechRecognitionLanguage
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: Specify the language for transcription. We highly recommend setting the language if you know it as specifying a language may improve transcription accuracy and speed.

preferences.name: modelName
preferences.title: ModelName
preferences.description: Speech-to-text Model [more...](https://docs.groq.com/docs/speech-to-text/models)

data.title: Whisper Large V3 Turbo (100 points per time)
